page.title: 09GARAGES IN NTH. KILWORTH
page.content: HOWKINS'GARAGE """""""""""""""""" Howkins' garage does not own the vintage cars which can be seen in the forecourt.A firm name Motorspot does. Michael has owned Howkins garage about 25 years. His father started the firm They sell everything to do with cars plus garden materials and coal. They are open 7 days a week and five people are employed there. The garage has always been called Howkins' garage. SAMBROOK'S GARAGE """"""""""""""""""""" Sambrook's also offers full repair facilities.They also sell new and used cars,as well as petrol and the usual motorists' sundries. GOODMAN'S GARAGE. """""""""""""""""""" A full range of serving,etc. is offered.In addition they repair mowers
